text: Charmus laneaus is a species of scorpion in the family Buthidae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. It is not known fatal to humans. Once thought to be extinct, as there were only fossils found of this species, Charmus laneaus is alive and thrives on Sri Lanka. ==References== Category:Buthidae Category:Animals described in 1879 Category:Endemic fauna of Sri Lanka
title: Charmus laneaus
